title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin analyzes the Lakers as their struggles continue and why LeBron James needs to take some responsibility for this season despite his great play on the court. He lays out an argument about the decline of the MVP across major sports and why this week could be the ultimate tipping point to prove it's meaningless. He shares his top 10 players in the Super Bowl between the Rams and the Bengals. Plus, Chargers running back Austin Ekeler joins the show to talk about playing with quarterback Justin Herbert. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
